description:
During an invention award show that Bulma is attending, a robot girl named Arale crashes the party. Tricked by the spectral Dr. Mashirito, she has an incredible urge to play and won’t let Saiyans get in her way! How can Goku and Vegeta defeat an opponent who blissfully ignores the laws of physics?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goku gegen Arale! - Zerstört ihr verrückter Kampf die Erde?
Goku vs Arale! A Ridiculous Battle Will End the Earth?!
Gokuu tai Arale! Hachamecha Battle de Chikyuu ga Owaru!?
悟空VS[たい]アラレ! ハチャメチャバトルで地球が終わる!?
